 We find you the best OPT jobs in the USA and CPT jobs from the companies who are willing to sponsor H1B for international students.

We are the best among the job sites in the USA. Being an International student and achieving a job within a short span isn’t that easy, But we made it simple for you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

AmericanOPT platform is designed to support job seekers and recruiters who are actively searching for the best. We support International students, Visa Status Holders, and OPT students.

We at AmericanOPT understand the situation of OPT students. We focus on your specialization, qualifications, preferred location, and provide you the ideal job choices for OPT and CPT job seekers.

Finding a fresher or entry-level job is not all tough if you choose AmericanOPT. All you need is your efforts.

AmericanOPT is the best among the job sites in USA that offers you Resume Blast Services where you can design your resume in a better way. We will send your profile to top employers and improve the chances of reaching your dream job.

Sign Up & Submit

Sign Up & Update
